member.name: T:SeatsSuggestions.Api.Controllers.SeatsSuggestionsController
member.summary: Web controller acting as a left-side Adapter of a Hexagonal Architecture.

member.name: T:SeatsSuggestions.Api.SwaggerDefaultValues
member.summary: Represents the Swagger/Swashbuckle operation filter used to document the implicit API version parameter.
member.remarks: This is only required due to bugs in the . Once they are fixed and published, this class can be removed.

member.name: M:SeatsSuggestions.Api.SwaggerDefaultValues.Apply(Microsoft.OpenApi.Models.OpenApiOperation,Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.OperationFilterContext)
member.summary: Applies the filter to the specified operation using the given context.
member.param: The operation to apply the filter to.
